channel.title: recipes on Ben H
channel.description: Recent content in recipes on Ben H

item.title: Pan-seared Ribeye Steak
item.description: Ingredients 1 - 1&1/4 " thick. Weighted pan, set heat to 7 (HIGH). Pan may smoke before steak is on, that is ok. Steps Season steak in S&P (and probably butter beforehand). Butter will burn in pan if thrown in, so don’t. Place in pan. Not too much splattering. For medium/med-rare, cook 4-5 minutes per side. Noteworthy, when blood begins to seep out the top of the steak, it is getting close to done.

item.title: Banana Bread
item.description: No need for a mixer for this recipe! Clean-up is easy too, if you want, you can mix everything in one mixing bowl. The best bananas to use for banana bread are those that are over- ripe. The yellow peelsshould be at least half browned, and the bananas inside squishy and browning. Prep time: 10 minutes Cook time: 55 minutes Yield: Makes one loaf Ingredients 2 to 3 very ripe bananas, peeled (about 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 cups mashed) 1/3 cup melted butter, unsalted or salted 1 teaspoon baking soda Pinch of salt 3/4 cup sugar (1/2 cup if you would like it less sweet, 1 cup if more sweet) 1 large egg, beaten 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 1 1/2 cups of all-purpose flour Steps Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C), and butter a 4x8-inch loaf pan.

item.title: Oven-baked Chicken Breasts
item.description: Ingredients 1 - 1.5 pounds boneless chicken breasts Steps Preheat the oven to 400 degrees Wash chicken breasts, coat in olive oil and italian seasonings. Lightly grease glass baking pan. place breasts in pan, and garnish with black pepper Cook 24 minutes.

item.title: Breakfast Smoothie
item.description: Ingredients Strawberries Bananas Vanilla Yoghurt Oats Milk Steps Blend

item.title: Pasta Fagoli Soup
item.description: Ingredients 3 slices salt pork (or half pack bacon) 1 Tbsp olive oil 1 Tbsp roasted garlic 10oz frozen seasoning blend (onions, peppers, celery) 1/2 cup chopped carrots 1 tsp Italian seasoning 1/4 tsp black pepper 32oz reduced-sodium chicken soup broth 2 cans great northern beans 1/4 cup sun-dried tomato pesto important! 1 cup ditalini pasta Steps Cut salt pork into small pieces. Either cook in microwave or directly into a large saucepan.

item.title: Baked Spaghetti
item.description: Source: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/222582/baked-spaghetti/ Ingredients 1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti 1 pound ground beef 1 onion, chopped White Onion, Large 1 (32 ounce) jar meatless spaghetti sauce 1/2 teaspoon seasoned salt 2 eggs 1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese 5 tablespoons butter, melted 2 cups small curd cottage cheese, divided 4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided Steps Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.

item.title: Parmesan Crusted Chicken
item.description: Ingredients 2 lb Boneless Skinless Chicken Breast 1 Egg 1 tbsp Water 1 tsp minced Garlic 1/2 tsp Salt 1/2 tsp Black Pepper 2 cup Shredded Parmesan Cheese 4 tbsp Butter 2 tbsp Olive Oil Bread crumbs Steps Cut each breast in half and pound to about 1/2″ thick. Beat egg and water in a shallow bowl until blended. Add garlic, salt and pepper and whisk to blend.
